# Post to Mastodon

[Back to main](/)

Here you can find the Raid-related scripts.

## Raid reaction - add raider to stream title

This reaction will update your current stream title to add in the name of any raider that shows up.

> [!NOTE]
> Twitch stream titles are limited to 140 characters, and if the newly generated title is longer than 140 characters, the title will not update

### Installation instructions

1. import the following into Streamer.bot

```

```

2. You can update the "raiderTag" argument to anything you want. This tag will be attached to the end of the stream title if it isn't already found. The default value is `|| Raiders:`
